concept.title: conref tasks concept

conbody.p: Tasks and plans are packaged in modules, so you can install them as you would any module from the and manage them with a Puppetfile.

p.note: For any tasks that you intend to use with PE and assign RBAC permissions, makesure the script safely handles parameters or validate them to prevent shell injection vulnerabilities.
is packaged with a collection of modules that contain useful plans to support common workflows. For details, see Packaged modules.
